user_request: Empty the shopping cart on newegg.com. Add logitech g pro to the cart on newegg.com, then select checkout.

The estimated total is $1,668.99. Options are available to edit the protection plan, update item quantities, save items for later, or remove them. A prominent orange button at the bottom allows the user to proceed with a secure checkout.
